00062 ConnectionHandler::ConnectionHandler(Comm *comm, ApplicationQueuePtr &appQueuePtr, RangeServerPtr rangeServerPtr, MasterClientPtr &masterClientPtr) : m_comm(comm), m_app_queue_ptr(appQueuePtr), m_range_server_ptr(rangeServerPtr), m_master_client_ptr(masterClientPtr), m_shutdown(false) {

00077 void ConnectionHandler::handle(EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00078   short command = -1;
00079 
00080   if (m_shutdown)
00081     return;
00082 
00083   if (event_ptr->type == Event::MESSAGE) {
00084     ApplicationHandler *requestHandler = 0;
00085 
00086     //event_ptr->display();
00087 
00088     try {
00089       if (event_ptr->messageLen < sizeof(int16_t)) {
00090         std::string message = "Truncated Request";
00091         throw new ProtocolException(message);
00092       }
00093       memcpy(&command, event_ptr->message, sizeof(int16_t));
00094 
00095       // sanity check command code
00096       if (command < 0 || command >= RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_MAX) {
00097         std::string message = (std::string)"Invalid command (" + command + ")";
00098         throw ProtocolException(message);
00099       }
00100 
00101       switch (command) {
00102       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_COMPACT:
00103         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerCompact(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(), event_ptr);
00104         break;
00105       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_LOAD_RANGE:
00106         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerLoadRange(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(), event_ptr);
00107         break;
00108       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_UPDATE:
00109         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerUpdate(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(), event_ptr);
00110         break;
00111       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_CREATE_SCANNER:
00112         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerCreateScanner(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(), event_ptr);
00113         break;
00114       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_DESTROY_SCANNER:
00115         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerDestroyScanner(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(), event_ptr);
00116         break;
00117       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_FETCH_SCANBLOCK:
00118         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerFetchScanblock(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(), event_ptr);
00119         break;
00120       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_DROP_TABLE:
00121         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerDropTable(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(), event_ptr);
00122         break;
00123       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_REPLAY_START:
00124         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerReplayStart(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(), event_ptr);
00125         break;
00126       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_REPLAY_UPDATE:
00127         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerReplayUpdate(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(), event_ptr);
00128         break;
00129       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_REPLAY_COMMIT:
00130         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerReplayCommit(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(), event_ptr);
00131         break;
00132       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_DROP_RANGE:
00133         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerDropRange(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(), event_ptr);
00134         break;
00135       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_STATUS:
00136         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerStatus(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(), event_ptr);
00137         break;
00138       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_SHUTDOWN:
00139         m_shutdown = true;
00140         HT_INFO("Executing SHUTDOWN command.");
00141         {
00142           ResponseCallback cb(m_comm, event_ptr);
00143           cb.response_ok();
00144         }
00145         m_app_queue_ptr->shutdown();
00146         m_app_queue_ptr->join();
00147         m_app_queue_ptr = 0;
00148         m_range_server_ptr = 0;
00149         m_master_client_ptr = 0;
00150         return;
00151       case RangeServerProtocol::COMMAND_DUMP_STATS:
00152         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerDumpStats(m_comm, m_range_server_ptr.get(), event_ptr);
00153         break;
00154       default:
00155         std::string message = (string)"Command code " + command + " not implemented";
00156         throw ProtocolException(message);
00157       }
00158       m_app_queue_ptr->add( requestHandler );
00159     }
00160     catch (ProtocolException &e) {
00161       ResponseCallback cb(m_comm, event_ptr);
00162       std::string errMsg = e.what();
00163       HT_ERRORF("Protocol error '%s'", e.what());
00164       cb.error(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, errMsg);
00165     }
00166   }
00167   else if (event_ptr->type == Event::CONNECTION_ESTABLISHED) {
00168 
00169     HT_INFOF("%s", event_ptr->toString().c_str());
00170 
00175     if (m_master_client_ptr)
00176       m_app_queue_ptr->add( new EventHandlerMasterConnection(m_master_client_ptr, m_range_server_ptr->get_location(), event_ptr) );
00177   }
00178   else {
00179     HT_INFOF("%s", event_ptr->toString().c_str());
00180   }
00181 
00182 }
